DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Hemoglobin A1c Collection Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which a blood sample was collected to measure the amount of glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1c) present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Glycosylated Hemoglobin Measurement Specimen Collection
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._A quantitative measurement of the amount of glycosylated hemoglobin present in a sample of blood._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: A quantitative measurement of the amount of glycosylated hemoglobin present in a sample of blood.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: A quantitative measurement of the amount of glycosylated hemoglobin present in a sample of blood.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for 1302 study in rave. mc 10/27/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for 1302 study in Rave. mc 6/27/16
